OVERVIEW 

 Valliammai Engineering college was established on September 9, 1999 and presently conducts 7 Under graduate courses and 8 Post graduate courses. The college has highly qualified, dynamic and dedicated renowned faculty both from academic and industrial background. Besides, the students bring laurels to the college by securing university ranks. 

 It is situated in an extent of 13.5 acres and is by the side of NH 45, between Tambaram and Chengalpattu. The serene atmosphere with the surrounding greenery is conductive to the pursuit of higher studies. 
 The college functions from a multi â€“ storey building complex of 59,000 square metres to accommodate the demands of ever increasing number of students. 

 The Valliammai Engineering College is a part of the SRM Group of Educational Institutions, sponsored by the Valliammai Society. The Valliammai Society was founded by Dr.T.R.Paarivendhar , a well-known educationist, in the name of his mother Tmt. R.Valliammai, under whose care and guidance he attained greater heights in his personal development and whose ideals continue to inspire him.
